author: sdeboy
msg: Internal Chainsaw events are now tagged with application and hostname properties so they route by default to a 'chainsaw-log' tab
PropertyFilter was modified to not override existing logging event properties

author: sdeboy
msg: Corrected minor javadoc typo in Level
Adding TRACE level support to Chainsaw - not yet complete
Improved event routing code and removed the unused 'event type' flag support
Added LogFilePatternReceiver section to example receiver configuration (available from Welcome tab)

author: hoju
msg: Make sure the default logger repository isn't null in a new selector that has been passed into setRepositorySelector().  This avoids catastrophic failure of all apps in a container (tested with Tomcat).

author: ceki
msg: - Tweaking the repository selector initialization code as discussed on log4j-dev@.
- Added getDefaultRepository method to the RepositorySelector interface.
